metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3500 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: aria2c in aria2 1.33.1, when --log is used, can store an HTTP Basic Authentication username and password in a file, which might allow local users to obtain sensitive information by reading this file. It was discovered that aria2 could accidentally leak authentication data. An attacker could possibly use this to gain access to sensitive information.

criterions.comment: aria2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.34.0-4').
